de.must.appletserver
Class GeneralizedRequest

java.lang.Object
  de.must.appletserver.GeneralizedRequest

public class GeneralizedRequest
extends java.lang.Object

A container for different request types. Allows us to treat different request types generalized Thus, we don't have to care if we handle multipart request (file upload) or standard requests.

Constructor Summary
GeneralizedRequest(HttpServletRequest request)
          Constructs a new generalized request.

Constructor Detail

GeneralizedRequest

public GeneralizedRequest(HttpServletRequest request)
Constructs a new generalized request. Most important is the fact that getParameter() works in the same manner in both cases: multipart and standard form. Parses parameters and file parts and buffers the file content if the content type is multipart.

Parameters:
request - the standard HttpServletRequest
Method Detail

getStandardRequest

public HttpServletRequest getStandardRequest()
Returns the standard HttpServletRequest

Returns:
the standard HttpServletRequest

getMultipartRequest

public MustMultipartRequest getMultipartRequest()
Returns the multipart request if it is one. Else returns null.

Returns:
the multipart request

getParameter

public java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String name)
Returns the parameter value of the parameter name as specified. This is done no matter if the request is multipart or standard.

Parameters:
name - the name of the parameter to read
Returns:
the parameter value

getParameter

public java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String clientCharset)

getFileBuffer

public FileBuffer getFileBuffer(java.lang.String name)
Returns the file buffer of the file name as specified.

Parameters:
name - the name of the file buffer
Returns:
the file buffer

getMethod

public java.lang.String getMethod()
Returns the request method.

Returns:
the method
